definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
mendicant religious order in Catholicism/Franciscan order

sentences.english: Poor Clare Nuns attempted to repair this damage with patches.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的克莱尔修会修女尝试去修复这个肖像。

sentences.english: I am sure this picture of Mr. Reid kneeling in prayer was taken at one of Calvary's camps or retreats.
sentences.chinese: 李牧师跪下祈祷的照片是在夏令会或退修会拍下。

sentences.english: Does the Priory of Sion really exist?
sentences.chinese: 峋山隐修会真的存在吗？

sentences.english: People in some religious orders take a vow of celibacy.
sentences.chinese: 有些宗教修会的人发誓不结婚。

sentences.english: Yes, but not as described by Brown.
sentences.chinese: 峋山隐修会真的存在，但并不像布朗所描述的那样。

sentences.english: Some of Angela's followers became known as the Order of Saint Ursula.
sentences.chinese: 部分安琪的追随者后来成了圣吴苏乐修会。

sentences.english: The retreat was customized for full time caregivers from various Christian social ministries.
sentences.chinese: 此退修会特为关怀机构的全时间同工而量身设计的。

sentences.english: And he was a Grand Master of the Priory of Sion.
sentences.chinese: 他还是位郇山隐修会的大师。

sentences.english: Church Retreat is less than two months away.
sentences.chinese: 尚有不到两个月退修会就来到了。

definition: nun or sister (of the Roman Catholic or Greek Orthodox churches)
the Church (as Royal Court)/the Holy See/the Vatican
